DOC.brief_summary: Using retrospective database analysis , OA patient take least one CYP450-metabolized opioid ( codeine , fentanyl , hydrocodone , methadone , oxycodone , tramadol ) least one prescription drug metabolize via CYP450 system evaluate incident drug-drug exposure ( DDE ) , place risk experience pharmacokinetic drug-drug interaction ( DDI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Potential Cytochrome P450 Pharmacokinetic Incident Drug-Drug Interactions ( DDI ) Among Osteoarthritis Patients
